Question
========
What is the percentile score of the student with student number 244081 (variable: student) associated with the grade of exam 3 (variable: course3). Write your answer in the answer box (with 2 decimal places).

* Download**: [SPSS file](eur-descriptive-218-en-data.sav), [CSV file](eur-descriptive-218-en-data.csv)


Solution
========
The correct answer is 20.94.
